sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-form v-model="valid">
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12" md="4">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="tarefa.title"
              :counter="48"
              label="First name"
              required
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>

          <v-col cols="12" md="4">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="tarefa.project"
              :counter="10"
              label="Last name"
              required
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-btn color="success" class="mr-4"> Confirmar</v-btn>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-form>
    <v-btn :to="{ name: 'TasksList' }">Voltar</v-btn>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => {
    return {
      tarefa: {
        title: "",
        project: "",
      },
    };
  },
  created() {
    this.tarefa.title = this.$route.params.tarefa.title;
    this.tarefa.project = this.$route.params.tarefa.project;
  },
};
</script>
